message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can discuss a better split in the following rounds.
My turn for a starting offer. This is negotiable, but let's see if we can settle quickly.
Let's split it down the middle.  We both lose value with each round, so a 50/50 split is the most logical way to ensure we both get something.
Time is ticking and we're both losing money. I'm coming closer to your offer, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me.
I'm willing to go up to 400,000.  We're both losing a lot of value, so let's try to reach an agreement before we lose everything.
